title: Lumine Engine
shortDescription: Custom C++ graphics engine built on DirectX 12. Features deferred rendering, resource management, and PSO pipeline.

details.overview: Lumine is a custom graphics engine built to test the capabilities of DirectX 12. It features a deferred rendering pipeline and supports modern shading techniques.
contributions: Setup DirectX 12 boiler plate: Device, Command Queues, and Swap Chain.
Implemented root signatures and pipeline state objects (PSOs).
Created a resource management system for buffers and textures.

longFormContent.content: Managing manual resource barriers and memory allocation was the primary challenge. I used D3D12MA to help manage GPU memory heaps efficiently.
